q: How do I get started with Web Monetization?
a: General information about the Web Monetization standard can be found on the official homepage. Setup guide and project template for Defold available from the Defold manual on Web Monetization. Setup guides and project templates for other engines also exist: Godot, Phaser and Unity.

q: How many games can I submit?
a: As many as you want! But we recommend that you focus on quality over quantity!

q: Is this game jam restricted to Defold developers?
a: Not at all! The ability to monetize web games concerns all developers, regardless of the technology used to create the games. We want as many developers as possible to get a chance to explore how to monetize their creations in new ways.

q: How do I host my playable game so that it is available for anyone to play?
a: You have many different options. You can host the game on your own site and domain to give you full control, but you could also use GitHub Pages or simmer.io (for Unity games).
Great! Post questions on Twitter or send an email with your question to webmonetization@defold.se.
